name: 07-data-210-worksheet-homework-spring-2016
body:
In this homework you will create a database from scratch, insert, update, delete, and select entries from it.

1. Define the following tables in postgres. The first one can be called Persons and the second can be called Courses.

| ID            | Name          | GPA   |
| ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
| 1             | Paul          | 3.8   |
| 2             | Aspen         |   3.2 |
| 3             | Sebastian     |  3.85 |
| 4             | Sarah         |   3.9 |
| 5             | Jill          |   2.5 |

ID should be the primary key. Name should be a varchar with a maximum size of 10, and GPA should be a decimal.

| ID            | PID           | Name   |
| ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
| 1             | 2             | DATA 210   |
| 2             | 2             | CSCI 334 |
| 3             | 3             | CSCI 334 |
| 4             | 4             | DATA 210 |
| 5             | 5             | CSCI 470 |
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
